languages.text: "Девушка, предназначенная мне судьбой. Не любовь всей жизни, но... моя сестра?" {n}Вздрогнув, Маттис впивается в Кибеллу взглядом.{/n} "Я не знал. А ты... помнишь меня?"

traits.locale_text: "Девушка, предназначенная мне судьбой. Не любовь всей жизни, но часть ее. Моя... моя сестра". {n}Вздрогнув от собственных слов, Маттис впивается в Кибеллу взглядом, словно боясь, что она исчезнет.{/n} "Я даже не подозревал. А ты... ты помнишь меня?"

languages.text: "The woman who was destined for me. Not the love of my life, but... my sister?" {n}Mattis shudders and stares intently at Kibellah.{/n} "I didn't know. Do you... remember me?"
languages.original_text: "Девушка, предназначенная мне судьбой. Не любовь всей жизни, но... моя сестра?" {n}Вздрогнув, Маттис впивается в Кибеллу взглядом.{/n} "Я не знал. А ты... помнишь меня?"

traits.locale_text: "The girl who was destined for me. Not the love of my life but... my sister?" {n}Mattis shudders and stares intently at Kibellah.{/n} "I didn't know. And you — do you remember me?"
"The girl who was destined for me. Not the love of my life but... my sister?" {n}Mattis shudders and stares intently at Kibellah.{/n} "I didn't know. And you — do you remember me?"
"The girl who was destined for me. Not the love of my life but... my sister?" {n}Mattis shudders and stares intently at Kibellah.{/n} "I didn't know. Do you... remember me?"
"The girl who was destined for me. Not the love of my life but... my sister?" {n}Mattis shudders and stares intently at Kibellah.{/n} "I didn't know. Do you... remember me?"
"The woman who was destined for me. Not the love of my life, but... my sister?" {n}Mattis shudders and stares intently at Kibellah.{/n} "I didn't know. Do you... remember me?"
"The woman who was destined for me. Not the love of my life, but... my sister?" {n}Mattis shudders and stares intently at Kibellah.{/n} "I didn't know. Do you... remember me?"

languages.text: « La femme qui m'était destinée. Pas l'amour de ma vie, mais... ma propre sœur ? » {n}Mattis frémit en dévisageant Kibellah.{/n} « Je l'ignorais. Tu... tu te souviens de moi ? »
languages.original_text: "The woman who was destined for me. Not the love of my life, but... my sister?" {n}Mattis shudders and stares intently at Kibellah.{/n} "I didn't know. Do you... remember me?"

traits.locale_text: « La femme qui m'était destinée. Pas l'amour de ma vie, mais... ma propre sœur ? » {n}Mattis frémit en dévisageant Kibellah.{/n} « Je l'ignorais. Tu... tu te souviens de moi ? »

languages.text: «La mujer que formaba parte de mi destino. No era el amor de mi vida, sino... ¿mi hermana?». {n}Mattis se estremece y observa en silencio a Kibellah.{/n} «No lo sabía... ¿Me... recuerdas?».
languages.original_text: "The woman who was destined for me. Not the love of my life, but... my sister?" {n}Mattis shudders and stares intently at Kibellah.{/n} "I didn't know. Do you... remember me?"

traits.locale_text: «La mujer que formaba parte de mi destino. No era el amor de mi vida, sino... ¿mi hermana?». {n}Mattis se estremece y observa en silencio a Kibellah.{/n} «No lo sabía... ¿Me... recuerdas?».

languages.text: 「俺の運命の相手だった女性。それは愛する人じゃなくて…姉さんだったのか？」{n}マティスは体を震わせてキベラをマジマジと見つめる。{/n}「知らなかった。俺のこと…覚えてるかい？」
languages.original_text: "The woman who was destined for me. Not the love of my life, but... my sister?" {n}Mattis shudders and stares intently at Kibellah.{/n} "I didn't know. Do you... remember me?"

traits.locale_text: 「俺の運命の相手だった女性。それは愛する人じゃなくて…姉さんだったのか？」{n}マティスは体を震わせてキベラをマジマジと見つめる。{/n}「知らなかった。俺のこと…覚えてるかい？」

languages.text: “原来，那个与我的命运息息相关的女人，并不是我一生的挚爱，而是……我的姐姐？”{n}马蒂斯颤抖着，目不转睛地盯着绮贝菈。{/n}“我一直都被蒙在鼓里，你……你还记得我吗？”
languages.original_text: "The woman who was destined for me. Not the love of my life, but... my sister?" {n}Mattis shudders and stares intently at Kibellah.{/n} "I didn't know. Do you... remember me?"

traits.locale_text: “原来，那个与我的命运息息相关的女人，并不是我一生的挚爱，而是……我的姐姐？”{n}马蒂斯颤抖着，目不转睛地盯着绮贝菈。{/n}“我一直都被蒙在鼓里，你……你还记得我吗？”

languages.text: "Die Frau, die für mich bestimmt war. Nicht die Liebe meines Lebens, sondern ... meine Schwester?" {n}Mattis schaudert und starrt Kibellah eindringlich an.{/n} "Ich wusste es nicht. E-Erinnert Ihr euch an mich?"
languages.original_text: "The woman who was destined for me. Not the love of my life, but... my sister?" {n}Mattis shudders and stares intently at Kibellah.{/n} "I didn't know. Do you... remember me?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Frau, die für mich bestimmt war. Nicht die Liebe meines Lebens, sondern ... meine Schwester?" {n}Mattis schaudert und starrt Kibellah eindringlich an.{/n} "Ich wusste es nicht. E-Erinnert Ihr euch an mich?"

languages.text: "Kaderimde yazılı olan kadın, hayatımın aşkı değil de... Kız kardeşim miydi?" {n}Mattis, ürpererek dikkatle Kibellah'ya bakıyor.{/n} "Bilmiyordum. Beni... Hatırlıyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "The woman who was destined for me. Not the love of my life, but... my sister?" {n}Mattis shudders and stares intently at Kibellah.{/n} "I didn't know. Do you... remember me?"
